channel.title: Pistols on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Pistols on Game6r

item.title: gun survival game
item.description: Take command of a detachment of space police and try to exterminate all the intergalactic robbers. You have to make your way through the dark corridors of an abandoned station and destroy everyone who meets on the way. To defeat the enemy, you will need excellent reaction and a keen eye.

item.title: Pistol training game
item.description: In front of you is a multifunctional shooting range with a variety of targets. You can choose your location for training - be it a gym or an open area. As you decide, you will get access to several types of pistols. But do not rush to spend all the ammo. First aim well and fire a couple of shots to get used to the weapon.
